Our Services

Signage

Make your idea come to life. Let us do the heavy lifting and get your sign in front of the people who matter, your customers.

Lettering

With years of expertise we can make your lettering stand out among any viewer.

Vehicle Wraps

They say vehicle marketing is one of the most powerful forms of marketing and we agree. That is, if done right. We take pride in the clean designs we provide for vehicles of all sizes.

Mural Design

Have an idea for the office or even something you want done at your house? Make the walls come to life around you with the amazing artwork designs of Jason Ouellette.

Photo Services

Whether its a wedding, personal event or you just need some new family photos done. We can help you out in all aspects of photography.

Web design

Have a website built properly with html, css and javascript. We dont waste our time with box cutter web design platforms. We create you the real thing. Exactly how you want it.

SEO

SEO. Search Engine Optimization. Whats the point of an awesome website and business if no one can find you? Let our experts help get more people to your business.

Vinyl Graphics

Let us create your vinyl graphics. We can create car decals, window decals, bumper stickers and more.

See The Full Portfolio

Lets make your visual project come to life.

Sign, sign everywhere a sign and usually in the city of Barrie it’s Imagineers behind that sign. Imagineers specializes in creative design solutions for your home or business, combining their two departments of advertising and a sign shop. The downtown Barrie business has been the quiet company behind the scenes on many projects around the city and beyond. Owner Jason Ouellette has been running the company since 2012 and has enjoyed the success he believes the company has had. “I took over Imagineers in 2012 having worked there previously and I feel it’s really grown into a go-to place for people to come for their promotional needs,” said Ouellette. “We’ve had many big projects in the last five years and it’s only getting busier with all the requests coming in every week.” Imagineers really is the place to go for all your sign needs within Barrie. Its great to have an industry leader right here in our backyard.

Our team is committed to providing quality customer service and products for an ever changing marketplace. We execute each project by staying current with the latest materials, equipment, design, and manufacturing processes. Our goal is to be industry leaders in meeting the needs of each of our clients with exciting and innovative design solutions. With over 20 years experience, we are one of Barrie Ontario's top design/sign shops. Call us today for a free consultation or estimate.
